title: Did Soleimani Command Forces That Killed U.S. Capt. Brian S. Freeman?
subtitle: Widely shared Facebook posts provided a poignant reflection in the U.S. in the wake of the assassination of the Iranian major general in January 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Qassem Soleimani commanded forces that killed five U.S. service members, including Capt. Brian S. Freeman, in an attack in Karbala, Iraq, in January 2007.
